name: drone-status
description: Drone Status is a VSCode extension to check Drone build status.

droneStatus.server.description: Drone Server. Defaults to DRONE_SERVER environment variable
droneStatus.server.markdownDescription: Drone Server. Defaults to `DRONE_SERVER` environment variable

droneStatus.token.description: Drone token. Defaults to DRONE_TOKEN environment variable
droneStatus.token.markdownDescription: Drone token. Defaults to `DRONE_TOKEN` environment variable

droneStatus.repo.description: (Optional) Repository name. Defaults to your workspace folder name.
droneStatus.repo.markdownDescription: (Optional) Repository name. Defaults to your workspace folder name.

droneStatus.owner.description: (Optional) Repository owner. Defaults to username from API result.
droneStatus.owner.markdownDescription: (Optional) Repository owner. Defaults to username from API result.
